title: (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations concern means assessments for qualified adults who are a 
spouse, civil partner, or a cohabitant of a recipient of jobseeker’s allowance, 
disability allowance, farm assist, or pre-retirement allowance. 

The Regulations provide that the income of a spouse, civil partner, or a 
cohabitant derived from employment or self-employment is treated in the same 
way as other forms of income in determining if that person is to be considered 
to be wholly or mainly maintained by the recipient of the core social welfare 
payment.
